text: Kweku Addo (born 23 August 1967) is a Ghanaian politician, living in Accra, Ghana. == Early life and Professional career == For more than ten years, Kweku Addo served as a Lay Minister in the Lighthouse Chapel International Ministry. He had served as an associate pastor in Accra and the surrounding areas for the Hour of Solutions International Ministry. Kweku Addo volunteered for the presidential campaign of Barack Obama. On the National Democratic Congress ticket, he ran in the 2020 General Elections. == References == Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Ghanaian politicians Category:People from Accra
title: Kweku Addo
